gameDetails.name: Isle of Skye: From Chieftain to King â€“ Themed Tiles
gameDetails.description:
(Themenplättchen = German for "theme tiles")

This mini-expansion introduces six new tiles with Lookout themes: Agricola, Caverna, Snowdonia, Le Havre, Costa Rica and The Colonists. Full English rules can be found in the Files section.

Note: There is an error in the official English rules for the "Agricola" tile: The depicted enclosed pasture does not count as a completed area. (Ref: Re: What is the right rule  for the Agricola tile)
